reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: MERO Middle East Regional Office

description.narrative: 1. Project 10780 MERO Middle East Regional Field Office##2. Project area and country: Jordan, IOPT, Syria # #3. Project justification: #In 2019, FCA continues to engage in development, humanitarian aid and advocacy work in the Middle East with focus on R ight to Quality Education, which is connected to livelihoods through the linking learning to earning (LL2E) principle. The Middle East programme countries will also focus on the education sector development in close collaboration with local authorities and institutions. Overall, attention will be paid to building long-term resilience of youth and young adults in vulnerable life situations. Efficient and coherent functioning of the country programmes requires both overall coordination and high-quality suppor t services, which are provided by the regional office located in Amman. ##4. The main objective and the expected results: #Improved effectiveness, quality, and impact of FCAs Middle East country programmes through field presence. The main expected results include:## Strategic guidance and overseeing of the Middle East country programmes # Overall coordination of PMER in the region # Capacity building of FCAs Middle East staff # Dialogue with local authorities and various other actors # Networking at both co untry and regional level # Support and input for communication purposes # Enhanced access to additional funding opportunities # Coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations # Input by partner organisations and topics from the region in to the lobby and advocacy work # Active monitoring of the security situation # Provision of HR, financial, logistic and procurement support services ##5. Implementing partner: FCA Middle East Regional Office
